description: The desire to share what one feels or experiences with others. It can be described as the urge to tell others everything. 「Qingsuyu」 refers to 「the desire to be understood or validated by expressing one's thoughts」.

examples.chinese: 我好想和人聊天,控制不住的分享欲
examples.translation: I really want to chat with someone, I can't control my desire to share.

examples.chinese: 有时候忍一忍自己的分享欲,会发现也没有什么话非要说
examples.translation: Sometimes if you hold back your desire to share, you'll realize there's nothing that absolutely needs to be said.

examples.chinese: 应该减少没必要的倾诉及分享欲
examples.translation: We should reduce unnecessary desire to confide and share.
